entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 29 December 2022
